value.title: Dynamically find header rows and promote them in Power Query
value.excerpt: Dynamically find a column header and promote them in power query is  a very common requirement, specially if you are importing data from excel or pdfs for example.  In today's video, I will show you how to do that with just a few simple steps!  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/7LJ0EgTc4rU" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: How to create functions in Power Query
value.excerpt: In this video I will show you how to create a custom function in Power Query.  Custom functions are re-usable pieces of code. So, as a rule, if you write the same code more than three times, you should do a function.  In this video I go through, step by step, how to create a function to import excel
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Ar_fV_oXSNs" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: How to do Pagination on a REST API in Power Query (Part 1)

value.title: Insert text anywhere in a cell without adding a new column using the Power Query User Interface.

In today's video, I will show you how you can use power query user interface, to insert text into a column without adding

value.title: Age Calculation in Power BI using Power Query
value.excerpt: Power Query has a simple way of calculating the age. However, because DAX is the popular language in many calculations in Power BI, many are not aware of this function in Power Query. In this video, I am going to show you how easy is to calculate Age in Power BI using Power BI. This method is very useful

value.title: Conditional Column in Power BI using Power Query   You can do anything

value.title: Generate Year Month Day Combinations in Power BI Report using Power Query Date ToText Function
value.excerpt: A common requirement when reporting data with a Date axis is to be able to see the year and the month in a short form beside each other. Formats such as 2021 Jan, or Jan 2021, or even Jan 21, or 2021-01 are very popular. In Power BI, ideally, you should have a Date dimension with columns for this. However,

value.title: How to Create a Date or Calendar Table and Dimension in Power BI using Power Query

value.title: Avoid filtering issues in Power Query
value.excerpt: Sometimes when you are filtering columns,  Power Query will create a filtering query that was probably not what you expected and it will either break your queries, or it will filter out values you want.  Let me show you!  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center

value.title: Bulk import data from multiple pages on a website with Power BI Desktop - Power BI Tips & Tricks #04
value.excerpt: Have you come across a website that has data you need but it is presented in multiple pages? Downloading page by page can be frustrating and time consuming. In this short video, I will show you how to iterate multiple pages on a website to import the data using Power BI.
